name: com.unity.polybrush
description:
Mesh painting, sculpting, and geo-scattering tool for Unity.

IMPORTANT: Polybrush is still in "Preview", and may cause instability or even data loss in your project. Please read the Known Issues section of the changelog before using.

samples.description: Polybrush samples compatible with Unity Standard rendering pipeline.
Polybrush samples compatible with Unity Lightweight rendering pipeline.
Polybrush samples compatible with Unity High Definition rendering pipeline.
